page.title: 20HOW I SPENT MY SATURDAY
page.content: My watch alarm woke me at 8.15 and I got dressed in my track suit and went downstairs to watch the Saturday Picture Show on television. I then rang friends to see if they wanted to play football on the playing fields, they agreed to meet me there. We had a good game until 1 pm then I had to go home for lunch. My mum decided to go to Chester because my dad let us have the car since he was working afternoons. After taking him to work we drove to Chester where my mum and I looked around the shops. We had tea at McDonalds and then went into W H Smith's and bought a computer game. At home I played on my computer until half past nine then my mum and I went to pick my dad up from work and he drove us home. I then went to bed and read Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom. {(Recreation)}
